pageProduct.name: Simple Kind To Skin Foaming Cleanser Vital Vitamin 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SIMPLE KIND TO SKIN FACIAL CLEANSER FOAM 150 ML

Simple Kind To Skin Foaming Cleanser Vital Vitamin 150ml, removes impurities and traces of make-up. Simple Vital Vitamin Foaming Cleanser is a perfect blend of multi-vitamins and skin-loving ingredients to remove impurities and traces of make-up leaving you feeling fresh-faced and ready for your next skincare step. Formulated with added moisturisers this light-weight foam cleanser keeps skin cleansed and refreshed. leaving you feeling fresh-faced and ready for your next skincare step. This foam cleanser turns from a liquid to a foam when pumped out onto your fingertips, making it super fun, quick and straightforward to use. For best results: Pump twice onto your fingertips and massage into wet skin, then rinse. If cleanser gets into your eyes rinse thoroughly with water. Simple have been the experts in sensitive skin since launching the first perfume and colour-free soap in 1960. We've stayed committed to our original philosophy of creating skincare products suitable for all skin types and as our product range has grown. For over 50 years, we've pioneered a kinder approach to skin. In fact, it's become something of an obsession. Over time we've really got to understand skin; what it does and the everyday challenges it faces. We've learnt that when something is as delicate and precious as skin, it deserves only the kindest care. For more information visit: http://www.simpleskincare.com.au

Boxed Contents: 150ml

Size: 150ml

KEY FEATURES

• Remove impurities and traces of make-up
• Refreshing and light-weight foam cleanser
• Added moisturisers
• Skin is soft, nourished, and cleansed
• Perfect for sensitive skin
• No artificial colours, perfume, or harsh chemicals that can upset your skin.

Ingredients

Aqua, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol,
Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Panthenol, Allantoin, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Glycolate,
Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid
